// Environment configuration for the SQL Practice Platform
// This centralizes all environment-specific settings
const config={// API Configuration - force correct Railway URL in production
API_BASE_URL:(()=>{const envUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||'http://localhost:5001/api';// Fix incorrect Railway URL missing -d4d1 suffix
if(envUrl.includes('sql-website-production.up.railway.app')){return envUrl.replace('sql-website-production.up.railway.app','sql-website-production-d4d1.up.railway.app');}return envUrl;})(),// App Information
APP_NAME:process.env.REACT_APP_NAME||'SQL Practice Platform',APP_DESCRIPTION:process.env.REACT_APP_DESCRIPTION||'Master SQL with interactive challenges',// Performance Settings
CACHE_TIMEOUT:parseInt(process.env.REACT_APP_CACHE_TIMEOUT)||2000,ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY_DURATION:parseInt(process.env.REACT_APP_ACHIEVEMENT_DURATION)||5000,REDIRECT_DELAY:parseInt(process.env.REACT_APP_REDIRECT_DELAY)||2000,TIME_UPDATE_INTERVAL:parseInt(process.env.REACT_APP_TIME_INTERVAL)||60000,// Authentication Settings
MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH:parseInt(process.env.REACT_APP_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH)||8,SESSION_PREFIX:process.env.REACT_APP_SESSION_PREFIX||'sql-practice-',// UI Settings
DEFAULT_EDITOR_HEIGHT:process.env.REACT_APP_EDITOR_HEIGHT||'500px',// Feature Flags
ENABLE_MOCK_DATA:process.env.REACT_APP_ENABLE_MOCK_DATA==='true',ENABLE_ANALYTICS:process.env.REACT_APP_ENABLE_ANALYTICS==='true',// Development Settings
IS_DEVELOPMENT:process.env.NODE_ENV==='development',IS_PRODUCTION:process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'};// Helper functions for common URL patterns
export const apiUrl=endpoint=>{// Remove leading slash if present to avoid double slashes
const cleanEndpoint=endpoint.startsWith('/')?endpoint.slice(1):endpoint;return"".concat(config.API_BASE_URL,"/").concat(cleanEndpoint);};export const authUrl=endpoint=>apiUrl("auth/".concat(endpoint));export const sqlUrl=endpoint=>apiUrl("sql/".concat(endpoint));export const bookmarksUrl=function(){let endpoint=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';return apiUrl("bookmarks".concat(endpoint?"/".concat(endpoint):''));};export const progressUrl=function(){let endpoint=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';return apiUrl("progress".concat(endpoint?"/".concat(endpoint):''));};export const recommendationsUrl=endpoint=>apiUrl("recommendations/".concat(endpoint));export const learningPathsUrl=function(){let endpoint=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';return apiUrl("learning-paths".concat(endpoint?"/".concat(endpoint):''));};export default config;
